s2.ptxt: If the fins of the cooler condenser are dirty, clean them with water. Dry the fins with compressed air.

atten3.ptxt: Do not damage the fins of the condenser.

s2.ptxt: If a fin of the cooler condenser is bent, straighten it using a screwdriver or pliers.

s-1.ptxt: CHECK CONDENSER FOR LEAKAGE OF REFRIGERANT

s2.ptxt: Using a halogen leak detector, check the pipe joints for gas leakage.
If gas leakage is detected in a joint, check the torque of the joint.
